name: It Stopped Raining
description:
29 years old Tina was hungry for a late night snack, she have nothing in her fridge, so she went to the 24 hours convenience store. The night was drizzling, so she took her umbrella and gone to the store. She was happy, she got awesome promo deal for the snacks and soft drinks, "Buy 1 Get 1 free" snacks promo and free soft drink. "Wow! awesome! I can save some money" she said to her self. It was not her best day, she got yelled at work and her rent is over due, her landlord just called, she have to packed her things by the end of the week to find a cheaper place to stay. "Oh well" she said. "It stopped raining and the stars are shining, don't get sad, tomorrow is a new beginning" she said to her heart, she have to be optimistic because that's all she got.


00:19 seconds, 1080x1080p illustration video with instrumental audio.
